JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesDot Net Developer STATUS: Full-TimeREPORTS TO: ManagerLOCATION: Sion, MumbaiPOSITION SUMMARY:The Software Developer will assist in designing, installation, testing, and maintenance of software systems. You will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs or providing an entirely new software solution, also creating information systems by studying operations.ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS/PRIORITIES• Reviewing current systems• Presenting ideas for system improvements, including cost proposals• Working closely with analysts, designers and staff• Producing detailed specifications and writing the program codes• Testing the product in controlled, real situations before going live• Design, run and monitor software performance tests on new and existing programs for the purpose of correcting errors• Preparation of training manuals for users• Maintaining the systems once they are up and running• Preparing a work flow chart and diagram using knowledge of computer capabilities• Analyze and assess existing business systems and procedures, collaboration with internal users and departments• Identify requirements with potential and actual clients to understand service requirements• Hands-on experience developing test cases and test plans• Ability to conduct research into software-related issues and products• Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities• Develop software systems and maintain applications and databases by evaluating client needsQUALIFICATION:2-10 years of experience Required in, C#, Dot NetShould be any graduate from a recognized UniversityYou’ll need to be comfortable with• Object-Oriented Concepts• Design Patterns• Microsoft.Net Platform• C#• Web-Based Systems• Web API• HTML, CSS• Javascript• typescript• ASP.NetMvc• MS SQL Server.
